doc.after: Don Quixote is a Spanish novel by Miguel de Cervantes Saavedra Widely considered one of the greatest works of fiction ever published it follows the adventures of Alonso Quijano an hidalgo who reads so many chivalric novels that he decides to set out to revive chivalry under the name Don Quixote This illustration depicts Quijano before he begins his quest
